## SimpleSegment.segment property

The segment replaces the template in the templated string.

In the string "$<!-- -->{<!-- -->GREETING<!-- -->}<!-- -->, how are you?", the segment will replace $<!-- -->{<!-- -->GREETING<!-- -->}<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
segment: string | ResponseOutput;
```
